title: Boat Drink
directions: Fill a margarita glass with crushed ice. Pour tequila, melon liqueur, and triple sec into the glass. Top with sour mix, grenadine, lime juice, and orange juice.  Garnish with the cherry and a wedge of orange.
ingredients: 1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger good quality silver tequila
1/2 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger melon liqueur (such as Midori)
1 (1.5 fluid ounce) jigger orange juice, or to taste
